entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
